Malaysian detention centres have been accused of severe human rights violations, including the abuse of children and elderly detainees. A former detainee, who wished to only be known as Sengkee, told BFM News that two 13-year-old girls were allegedly forced to strip and beaten with a water pipe as punishment for staying awake at night. 1

Despite following all rules, guards arbitrarily withheld basic permissions and invented violations to punish them, particularly targeting female detainees. "The horrific conditions were beyond anything I could have imagined. The living condition is worse than in prison." 6

Detainees endured squalid conditions, with sick individuals denied medical treatment despite repeated pleas for help, as guards allegedly told them to just shower instead. Women and children were forced to shower communally, leading to outbreaks of skin diseases. 4

She also recounted how a 70-year-old woman with depression died in detention after officers forcibly fed her, worsening her condition while denying her medical care. "As she wouldn't eat, they shoved food into her mouth until she became sick, then offered no treatment." 3

The officers also forcibly removed the headscarves of the girls, who were Rohingya Muslims, and filmed their distress while laughing. "They cried a lot, it's just inhumanity. We can't even imagine how can they live the rest of their life," Sengkee said, citing it as an example of systemic abuse. 2
Sengkee, a student activist, fled Myanmar after joining the Civil Disobedience Movement against the military coup. She was detained for one year in Malaysia following her arrest during a raid. 7

"Even when some of the wounds got that smell, they didn't send to hospital, also didn't get medicine," she told BFM News. Sengkee added that they were routinely served rotten, foul-smelling fish and other inedible food, leaving detainees malnourished and ill. 5

Tinder is launching a new "double date" feature to attract Gen Z and young women seeking lower-pressure dating experiences. Upon activating it, users may select up to three friends to create a pair with. The feature will be available in the UK from mid-July. 1

Pairs can "swipe right" to like other pairs on the app, with only one like per pair needed to form a match. A match then triggers a group chat, where pairs can message each other and organise a date. 2

Pharmaniaga said it expects to remain in the black for the financial year ending Dec 31, 2025, after making a turnaround last year. The group posted a profit after tax of RM133.8 million for FY2024, a major recovery from the RM78.7 million loss recorded the year before. 1rttPharmaniaga Bhd reported a return to profitability with a net profit of RM131.8 million in FY2024, after two years of losses. The company's revenue increased by 10.4, rising to RM3.8 billion from RM3.4 billion in FY2023, primarily due to growth in its concession and Indonesia segments. 1

Moving forward for 2025, we are targeting to have very positive results, its MD Zulkifly Jafar said. The pharmaceutical group targets to deliver FY2025 revenue of RM4 billion, up from RM3.8 bil last year. It also expects to register a profit after tax of RM60 million. 2

This is lower than the RM133.8 million PAT recorded in FY2024, which included a one-off government penalty reversal related to Covid-19 drug deliveries. From 2025 onwards, there will be no such reversal. It will be a clean PAT with no anomalies, Zulkifli said. 3

Pharmaniaga, 54.5-owned by LTAT, also plans to resume quarterly dividend payouts once it exits PN17 status by end-2025 or early 2026. It last declared a dividend in FY2022 before it fell into PN17 after a RM552.3 million impairment from unsold Covid-19 vaccines. 4

Some bus operators in Malaysia allow drivers to work up to 28 days a month due to a severe manpower shortage. Drivers often take extra shifts to supplement their income, as they earn only a base salary of RM1,700 and rely heavily on travel allowances and overtime pay. 1

According to the Bumiputera Bus Operators Association, bus drivers typically work 20 days a month. However, some drivers work nearly the entire month through arrangements made with mutual consent, usually after being asked by employers to work on their off days. 2

"This often happens because many companies are struggling to find enough qualified drivers," the group said. It also noted that such arrangements enable drivers to earn RM3,000RM5,000 monthly, though allowance and overtime structures differ between companies. 3

Most companies do not set a fixed number of trips per day and ensure drivers receive adequate rest, typically allowing up to six hours between journeys. The group added that if a bus must depart sooner, another driver is assigned, preventing overwork and rushed schedules. 4

Over 2,000 metric tonnes of illegal e-waste worth RM500 million have been seized in a Bukit Aman crackdown targeting 57 illegal facilities, resulting in the arrest of 453 suspects. LHDN believes that the illegal activities evaded over RM500 million in taxes. : Bernama 1

The DOE issued 59 directives under the Environmental Quality Act, while 18 compounds were issued for various violations of the Environmental Quality Regulations. Bukit Aman notes that since the first e-waste operation on Jan 1, RM5.2 billion worth of e-waste has been seized. 3

LHDN says it plans to comb through the premises financial records for further investigation. Some e-waste premises were linked to the same owners, while seven licensed facilities were allegedly processing smuggled foreign e-waste. 2

A tour bus carrying 36 Indian nationals crashed on the North-South Expressway near Tanjung Malim yesterday afternoon. Muallim district police confirmed that all passengers, along with the Malaysian driver, escaped without injury. 1

All passengers were later transferred to a replacement bus to continue their journey to their respective destinations. Police added that road conditions were clear and the weather was good at the time of the incident. 3

Preliminary investigations revealed that the bus, which was en route from Kuala Lumpur to Ipoh, lost control and veered to the right side of the road. It then crashed into the central divider before ending up in a drain on the right side of the highway. 2

The High Court says there's nothing to show that the prosecution is able to proceed with its SRC International money laundering case against Najib Razak for now or within a reasonable time. "Once the accused is charged, the charge cannot be hanging over its head for an indefinite period. That would be harsh and illegal." 1rtt BREAKING: Najib Razak has been granted a DNAA on three money laundering charges involving RM27 million linked to SRC International Bhd. Najib's counsel had requested the DNAA due to prolonged uncertainty over the case. This includes the prosecution failing to provide the defence with documents related to the case.

The appropriate order was to discharge the accused without acquitting him, so that he is not burdened with the charges currently preferred against him. "There is no prejudice to the prosecution with this discharge, as it may still proceed with the case once it is ready to do so, says the court. 3

Najib is currently serving a 6-year jail sentence for the misappropriation of RM42 million in the SRC International funds case. 4rttBREAKING: Najib Razak has failed in his bid to review his conviction and sentence in the RM42 million SRC case. The Federal Court dismissed his application in a 4-1 majority decision. The former prime minister will have to continue serving his sentence in Kajang Prison.

The court says that since the case began in 2019, no witness testimony has been heard, only repeated postponements. The prosecution is still unprepared to proceed in the near future, lacking key documentary evidence, causing a prolonged delay that denies the accused a timely resolution, it says. 2

Over 23.6 million domestic users in West Malaysia will benefit from fairer electricity rates under a new tariff schedule from July 1, 2025 to December 31, 2027. The average base tariff has been revised to 45.40 senkWh, down from 45.62 senkWh approved in December 2024, says the Energy Commission. 1

The Energy Efficiency Incentive will benefit domestic users consuming up to 1,000 kWh and non-domestic users using under 200 kWh. The updated Time of Use scheme offers off-peak hours from 10pm to 2pm on weekdays and all day on weekends to encourage low-demand consumption, says ST. 2

The tariff revision involves restructuring the average base tariff, introducing a new schedule, and revamping the fuel cost adjustment mechanism. Under the new tariff schedule, users are categorised by voltage level, with charges reflecting actual costs across energy, capacity, network, and retail, says ST. 3

The Bar Council has set a mandatory RM1,350 minimum wage for chambering pupils in the Klang Valley starting April 2026. Firms outside the region must start with RM1,000, raise it to RM1,200 by 2027, and match the RM1,350 national minimum by 2028. 1rttFMT reports that law firms will soon be required to pay chambering students a minimum allowance, following an amendment to the Legal Profession Act 1976. The Bar Council has engaged EconWorks to design the framework for the minimum allowance. 1

The council noted many firms already pay above RM1,350 but set the minimum to prevent pupils from earning below the poverty line. The council said any rate increase should follow the average annual rise in Malaysias median monthly salary. 2

The EconWorks survey found that 17 of pupils earn below RM1,000, with Terengganu and Kelantan firms paying as little as RM500. In contrast, median pay in Johor and Penang is RM1,500, with lower wages more common in smaller firms. 4

The AGC has rejected claims of flawed prosecution in Najib Razak's second SRC International case, calling them baseless. Najib's counsel had requested the DNAA due to prolonged uncertainty over the case. This includes the prosecution failing to provide the defence with documents related to the case.

"The documents are available, but are currently being used as evidence in the ongoing 1MDB trial," said the AGC. It further stressed that prosecutors needed more time to gather documents for the SRC case, maintaining the delay was to preserve evidentiary integrity. 4

Both cases involved overlapping material documents required for the second SRC trial. As these documents were critical to the second SRC case, the prosecution had no choice but to wait until they were available, which was until the 1MDB trial proceedings were completed." 3

"They not only trap rays and juvenile fish, but also pose a serious threat to protected marine species such as the Irrawaddy dolphin," Kuala Kedah Maritime Zone said. The ray net, with an estimated value of RM2,000, is believed to have been used by irresponsible fishermen. 2

An endangered Irrawaddy dolphin was found dead in Kuala Kedah waters after being trapped in an illegal ray net, or "pukat pari". This marks the sixth ray net seizure in Kuala Kedah this year, as such nets are banned for endangering marine life through non-selective fishing. 1

The department warned warned that ray nets threaten both ray populations, which are crucial seabed predators, as well as overall marine biodiversity. Unchecked use risks driving rays to extinction while endangering dependent species. 3

The Irrawaddy dolphin, locally called empesut, is a rapidly declining species across Southeast Asia, including Malaysia. The death of even a single dolphin could critically impact the ecosystem due to the species' small and hard-to-monitor population. 4

Usai rencana di Sasana Kijang, saya menerima kunjungan Ketua Pegawai Eksekutif Global Shell, Wael Sawan bersama delegasi. Shell bukan sekadar nama besar dalam dunia tenaga, tetapi telah menjadi rakan pelaburan utama negara dan sebahagian daripada perjalanan ekonomi Malaysia sejak sekian lama. Saya manfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk berkongsi pendekatan strategik Kerajaan MADANI dalam menjadikan Malaysia sebagai destinasi pelaburan yang stabil, mampan dan berdaya tahan bukan hanya untuk hari ini, tetapi demi generasi mendatang. Saudara Sawan menyuarakan keyakinan terhadap arah tuju negara. Justeru, beliau memaklumkan bahawa Shell akan menambah pelaburan melebihi RM9 bilion dalam tempoh dua hingga tiga tahun akan datang, yang bakal mencipta peluang-peluang pekerjaan berkemahiran tinggi. Pelaburan ini adalah manifestasi keyakinan pelabur antarabangsa terhadap dasar ekonomi kita yang teguh dan kepimpinan yang jelas. Insya-Allah, Malaysia mampu terus melakar masa depan yang makmur dan berdaya saing. After concluding my engagement at Sasana Kijang, I received a courtesy call from Shells Global Chief Executive Officer, Mr Wael Sawan, and his delegation. Shell is more than just a major name in the global energy sector it has long stood as one of Malaysias principal investment partners, deeply embedded in the nations economic journey. I received a courtesy call from Shells Global Chief Executive Officer, Wael Sawan and his delegation, a valued partner whose presence in Malaysia reflects not only its stature as a global energy leader, but also its long-standing role in our nations economic journey. I took the opportunity to share the MADANI Governments strategic vision in shaping Malaysia as an investment destination anchored on stability, sustainability and long-term resilience, not only for todays gains but for the generations we hope to empower. Mr Sawan expressed Shells strong confidence in Malaysias direction. In that spirit, he declared the companys commitment to increase investments in Malaysia by over RM9 billion over the next two to three years, creating high-skilled job opportunities for Malaysians. This decision stands as a resounding vote of confidence from a world-class investor in our sound economic policies, clarity in our leadership, and promise in our future. Malaysia will continue to chart a course that is prosperous, resilient and worthy of its peoples highest hopes.

Dalam menghadapi ketidaktentuan ekonomi global, saya tegaskan keperluan untuk kita terus memperkukuh daya saing ekonomi domestik serta menjamin pulangan mampan kepada para pemegang unit amanah. Permodalan Nasional Berhad PNB dan Pelaburan Hartanah Berhad PHB perlu menggandakan usaha meningkatkan tahap celik pelaburan dalam kalangan masyarakat, khususnya Bumiputera. Perbadanan Usahawan Nasional Berhad PUNB pula harus kekal komited memperkasa usahawan Bumiputera melalui akses kepada pembiayaan serta sokongan peningkatan kapasiti dan keupayaan perniagaan. Saya tegaskan semua agensi dan syarikat berkaitan Kerajaan yang memegang mandat pembangunan Bumiputera mesti terus menjadi pemacu dasar dan pelaksana utama inisiatif Kerajaan, khususnya menerusi Pelan Transformasi Ekonomi Bumiputera PuTERA35 yang telah pun dilancarkan.

Beberapa NGO mendesak Polis Diraja Malaysia PDRM menyiasat Muhammad Yusoff Rawther atas dakwaan menjadi ejen atau proksi agensi perisikan Israel, Mossad. Ini susulan kenyataan Yusoff pada 2017 yang menyokong kewujudan Israel dan menolak hak negara Arab ke atas Baitulmaqdis, yang masih boleh diakses di media Israel. Ahli Sekretariat Nadi Gemilang Amal, Dzul Hilmi Zainol, berkata kenyataan itu bercanggah dengan pendirian Malaysia dan membuka ruang kepada pengaruh asing. Beliau juga mempersoalkan tindakan beberapa pemimpin politik dan peguam tempatan yang membela Yusoff. Peguam NGO, Asheeq Ali menasihatkan Yusoff agar tidak menjadi alat kuasa luar. Enam NGO hadir membuat laporan polis, menegaskan tindakan itu demi kedaulatan negara dan solidariti bersama Palestin.

Ini merupakan tradisi paling pelik di seluruh dunia! Seperti korang tahu, setiap negara mesti ada adat dan tradisi unik masing-masing, kan? Contohnya seperti di Malaysia, terdapat Perarakan Burung Petala di Kelantan yang dibuat untuk memperingati golongan bangsawan. Siap usung burung gergasi lagi tu! haa.. Malah terdapat juga tradisi tarian Ulek Mayang yang digunakan untuk mengelakkan nelayan dari dirasuk puteri laut. Tapi kebanyakan tradisi ini kini telah tiada lagi disebabkan arus pemodenan dan perubahan cara hidup masyarakat masa kini. Tapi itu baru dekat Malaysia Bayangkan macam mana pulak dengan tradisi di negara lain? Daripada berperang menggunakan buah-buahan sehinggalah kepada upacara memperingati pertempuran dengan...NAGA? Okra, also known as lady's finger, is a nutritious vegetable with a slender shape, soft hairs on the surface, and a mucilaginous interior. Rich in dietary fiber, vitamin C, and plant polysaccharides, it has a smooth texture and is known for its benefits in aiding digestion and cooling the body. Often stir-fried, blanched, or added to soups, okra is a popular choice for healthy eating.

Gourd strips are dried products made from sweet gourds, valued for their culinary, medicinal, and health benefits. Commonly used in stir-fries, soups, or as fillingsespecially popular in Northeastern Chinese stewsthey are rich in nutrients that help regulate blood pressure, boost immunity, and slow aging. Gourd saponins even show anti-cancer potential. In traditional Chinese medicine, gourd strips are believed to clear heat, detoxify, promote blood circulation, relieve pain, and aid digestion. However, those with weak digestion should use them with caution. Theyre also used for tying food and are known as kanpyō in Japanese cuisine, commonly found in sushi.

Cedar covered bridge is a traditional wooden arch bridge primarily built with cedar, commonly found in the mountainous regions of southern China. It serves not only as a passageway but also provides shelter from rain and a place to enjoy the scenery. The bridges refined structure is assembled entirely through mortise-and-tenon joints, without a single nail, showcasing the brilliance of ancient woodworking craftsmanship. With a roof and corridor atop, it offers pedestrians a space to rest and connect. Cedars light weight, durability, and resistance to decay make it an ideal building material. Beyond its practical use, the bridge embodies deep cultural heritage and rural sentiment, standing as a testament to the harmony between ancient people and nature.

Bracken fern, scientifically known as Pteridium aquilinum, is a common wild mountain vegetable that typically grows in moist environments such as forest edges and grassy slopes in mountainous areas. Its young shoots are curled, crisp, and tender, with a unique fragrance and slightly bitter taste. Often used in cold dishes, stir-fries, or pickled preparations, bracken fern is rich in dietary fiber, vitamins, and minerals. It offers health benefits such as clearing heat and aiding digestion, making it a popular seasonal green in spring and a widely regarded symbol of natural, healthy food in many regions.

Loach is a common freshwater fish with a slender, slippery, and agile body. Highly adaptable, it typically inhabits rice fields, ponds, ditches, and other shallow water bodies. Rich in high-quality protein, vitamins, and minerals, it offers excellent nutritional value and is widely loved. Loaches can survive in low-oxygen environments and are known as the "ginseng of the water" for their delicious taste and nourishing qualities.

Wooden wedge is a small, wedge-shaped block commonly used in construction, carpentry, and renovation. Typically made from hardwood, it is inserted into gaps with its gradually widening end to provide fixation, support, adjustment, or reinforcement. Despite its simple structure, the wooden wedge has a wide range of usesfrequently employed in door and window installation, floor leveling, and furniture assembly. It remains an essential and practical tool in both traditional and modern craftsmanship.

Benefits of Pruning Pumpkin Side Shoots:nn1. Concentrates nutrients Reduces competition, promoting stronger main vine and fruit growth.n2. Improves fruit set Increases fruiting efficiency by avoiding energy waste on unproductive branches.n3. Enhances airflow Reduces risk of pests and diseases by improving ventilation.n4. Eases management Makes field maintenance and harvesting more efficient.

Loach is a small, bottom-dwelling freshwater fish with a slender, smooth body, usually yellow-brown with spots. It prefers clean water environments with muddy bottoms, such as rice fields, ponds, or streams, and feeds on algae, plankton, and small insects. Loaches are highly adaptable and tolerant of low oxygen levels. They are rich in protein and various minerals, making them a popular and nutritious food choice. In traditional Chinese medicine, loaches are also considered beneficial for nourishing the liver, improving blood circulation, and boosting physical strength.

Ostrich egg is the largest bird egg in the world, typically weighing between 1.2 and 2 kilogramsequivalent to more than 20 chicken eggs. Its shell is thick and hard, with a creamy white or pale yellow color, and is often used for carving or crafts. Rich in protein, unsaturated fatty acids, and vitamins, ostrich eggs are considered a highly nutritious, low-cholesterol food. In Africa and on some farms, they are also served as festive meals or shared family dishes, symbolizing abundance and togetherness.

Ramie is a perennial herbaceous plant from the nettle family, mainly found in southern China. Its stalks are rich in strong plant fibers, making it one of the most important traditional raw materials for textile production. Ramie fibers are durable, breathable, and moisture-absorbent. Fabric made from ramie is cool, wear-resistant, and holds its shape well, making it ideal for summer clothing and household textiles. For centuries, the cultivation and processing of ramie have played a significant role in Chinese folk craftsmanship, reflecting the wisdom and heritage of traditional handwork.

Bamboo broom is a traditional and eco-friendly cleaning tool made primarily from natural bamboo twigs or stalks. It is sturdy yet lightweight, ideal for sweeping floors, yards, and farm areas. Simple in structure, it is typically formed by bundling bamboo sticks into a fan shape and securing them to a handle with rope or wire. Still widely used in rural and garden settings, the bamboo broom is both practical and economical, reflecting a blend of resourcefulness and traditional craftsmanship.

Silver gudgeon Squalidus argentatus, yín jū is a small, slender freshwater fish in the carp family, known for its silvery scales and agile swimming. It inhabits rivers, lakes, and reservoirs, feeding primarily on plankton. With strong reproductive ability and a role in the aquatic food chain, it serves as both an ecological indicator and a natural food source for birds and larger fish, playing an important part in maintaining freshwater biodiversity.

Weili Mini Milk Nang is a traditional Xinjiang pastry known for its crispy exterior and soft interior, with a rich milky flavor. The dough is made with fresh milk and yeast, fermented, and then baked in a tandoor, resulting in its unique taste. It is not only an essential part of the local diet but also enjoyed by many tourists, often served as a delicious accompaniment to main dishes

Lavender is a perennial aromatic plant native to the Mediterranean region and belongs to the Lamiaceae family. Its flower spikes are purple-blue in color and emit a rich, pleasant fragrance. Lavender is known for its calming, soothing, and sleep-aiding properties, and is widely used in aromatherapy, essential oils, skincare products, and dried floral decorations. It is highly adaptable, thrives in sunny, well-drained environments, and offers both ornamental beauty and natural insect-repelling benefits. Thanks to its fresh, charming scent and versatile uses, lavender is beloved by many and often referred to as the "King of Fragrance."

Black carp, also known as Mylopharyngodon piceus, is a large freshwater fish native to China and a key species in aquaculture. With a long, streamlined body, dark back, and pale belly, it can grow to several dozen kilograms. Black carp primarily feed on hard-shelled aquatic animals such as snails and mussels. Their firm, low-bone meat is prized for its rich flavor, making them popular in cuisine. Due to their fast growth, strong adaptability, and high nutritional value, they are widely farmed in ponds and reservoirs. As one of China's Four Major Domestic Fish, black carp hold an important place in both aquaculture and the food market.

Lychee is a tropical fruit native to southern China, known for its bright red skin and translucent, juicy flesh with a sweet and fragrant flavor. Rich in vitamin C, glucose, and organic acids, lychees are not only nutritious but also help quench thirst and boost energy. Due to their short shelf life, there's a saying that lychees lose their color in three days, highlighting their delicacy and freshness. In southern China, lychees are more than just a fruitthey're a cultural symbol, often referred to as the king of fruits.

Pressure-sensitive asphalt patching material is a new type of road repair compound that can be used at ambient temperature without heating. It features easy application, strong adhesion, and wide adaptability. Repairs can be completed quickly by compaction with vehicle traffic or manual pressing, making it especially suitable for emergency fixes of potholes and cracks. This material enables rapid restoration of road traffic and improves maintenance efficiency, making it an effective solution for modern road repair and emergency maintenance.

Stone frog is a large-sized amphibian that inhabits mountain streams and belongs to the genus Amolops in the family Ranidae. It gets its name from its habit of dwelling in crevices among rocks. Typically grayish-brown or dark green in color, it is highly camouflaged, adept at jumping, and known for its loud calls. Due to its sensitivity to environmental conditions, the stone frog is often regarded as an indicator species of a healthy ecosystem. Its tender, protein-rich meat also gives it both culinary and medicinal value, leading to artificial farming in some regions.

Benefits of Pressing Down Pumpkin Vines:nn1. Promotes Rooting: Contact with soil encourages adventitious roots, enhancing nutrient absorption.n2. Stabilizes the Plant: Prevents vines from being blown or broken by wind, supporting healthy growth.n3. Increases Yield: New roots improve nutrient uptake, which supports fruit development and productivity.n4. Saves Space: Guides vine direction, making field management and harvesting easier.n5. Suppresses Weeds: Ground-level vines cover the soil surface, reducing weed growth.

Benefits of Cleaning an Electric Water Heater:nn1. Improves Heating Efficiency: Removing limescale allows faster heating and saves energy.n2. Extends Lifespan: Regular cleaning reduces internal corrosion and prolongs the units life.n3. Ensures Water Hygiene: Prevents bacterial growth and keeps bathing water clean and safe.n4. Reduces Malfunctions: Lowers the risk of overheating or blockages in the heating element.n5. Saves on Energy Bills: Better heat transfer leads to reduced electricity costs over time.

Pickled long beans are a traditional fermented vegetable made from yardlong beans, known for their crisp texture and tangy, appetizing flavor. To prepare, fresh beans are washed, dried, and naturally fermented in salted water. Often used in stir-fries, soups, or served as a side dish, they not only enhance appetite but also aid digestion, making them a classic favorite on many family dining tables.

Pine nuts are the seeds of pine trees, encased in hard shells with white, aromatic kernels inside. They are rich in protein, unsaturated fatty acids, vitamin E, and other nutrients. With a crisp and nutty flavor, pine nuts are commonly used in baking, desserts, or eaten on their own, making them a popular and healthy snack. Not only nutritious, they are also valued in traditional remedies for nourishing the body, improving skin, and soothing the lungs a delicious gift from the forest.

Pine resin, extracted from the natural sap of pine tree trunks, has a strong, distinctive pine scent and appears yellowish or transparent. It is widely used in the production of fragrances, medicines, paints, and cleaning agents. As a traditional herbal remedy, it is known for its anti-inflammatory and decongestant properties. Sourced from nature, pine resin serves many purposes and bridges the forest with everyday life.

Lily is a perennial herbaceous plant known for its elegant, beautiful flowers and light fragrance, often used for ornamental gardening. Its bulbs are thick, white, and rich in nutrients, making them edible and medicinalwith benefits such as soothing the lungs, relieving cough, calming the mind, and nourishing the heart. Symbolizing purity and beauty, lilies are also regarded as a sign of good fortune in many cultures.

Leek flower sauce is a traditional Chinese condiment made primarily from fresh leek flower buds, blended with salt, cooking oil, soybean paste, and other seasonings. It has a strong, pungent aroma and a uniquely savory, slightly spicy flavor. With its bright green color and smooth texture, this sauce is commonly used as a dip for hot pot, barbecue, braised dishes, or as a topping for noodles and rice. Especially popular in northern China, its considered a flavorful and appetizing rice companion on many dining tables.

Catfish is a common freshwater fish known for its long body, broad head, and whisker-like barbels around the mouth. It is highly adaptable, grows quickly, and is widely found in lakes, reservoirs, ponds, and even rice field ditches. Catfish has tender meat with few bones and is rich in high-quality protein and unsaturated fatty acids, making it a popular choice on the table. Besides being delicious, catfish also holds significant economic value in aquaculture and is considered one of the most important edible fish species.

sakirah akop sanggup menggadaikan nyawa demi anaknya. rakaman adalah rakaman asli penemuan mayat mangsa. ketika menunggu bersama dengan anaknya didalam kereta , tiba-tiba kereta itu bergerak, suaminya yang sedang memancing cuba menyelamatkan mereka, tetapi sakirah membuka pintu dan mengatakan "Abang.. selamatkan baby dulu".. suami mangsa tidak sempat menyelamatkan sakirah, sakirah terjunam ke dalam sungai.

Dalam video kali ini, Galeri Kereta bawakan sebuah Honda City RS yang memang lain macam auranya milik seorang lady owner bernama Suhaila yang buktikan, modifikasi kereta bukan hanya untuk lelaki! Dengan balutan warna pink menyala, stance ngam, rim merah, dan detailing yang kemas, City ni tampil dengan karakter tersendiri. Bukan sekadar cantik, tapi juga fitment berani dan sentuhan penuh personaliti. Suhaila bukan main-main dalam dunia modifikasi ini adalah gaya yang dia bawa dengan penuh keyakinan. Three fathersdivorced, estranged, and quietly forgottenstruggle to hold on to their children and their sense of worth in a world that often expects men to move on without breaking. As love fades and families fracture, they must fight for connection before its too late. BELAIAN TERAKHIR is a tender, unflinching portrait of fatherhood, grief, and resilience in the face of love that no longer looks their way. Tiga bapa dari latar kehidupan berbeza berdepan dengan beban emosi akibat perpisahan dan keterasingan, mencabar tanggapan bahawa lelaki mudah pulih apabila keluarga runtuhmembuktikan bahawa peranan seorang ayah tidak berakhir apabila sebuah perkahwinan berakhir. --- Welcome to Mediacorp Drama, your go-to channel for the latest and the best of local dramas in English, Mandarin, Malay, and Tamil. "The International Atomic Energy Agency IAEA has said that Iran is not developing a nuclear bomb. US intelligence advisors have also told President Trump that. So this threat that Netanyahu keeps referring to, that Iran is so close to building a nuclear bomb, he's been saying this for decades. That is a very old and tired trick that Israel has used," Dr Shahram Akbarzadeh of Deakin University told BFM.nnIf Israel cared about stopping a nuclear weapon, they would go back into a nuclear deal that prevents Iran from a weapon. And guess who they killed? Ali Shamkhani, Iran's lead nuclear negotiator, broadcast journalist Mehdi Hasan said on Piers Morgan Uncensored this week.nnIsrael launched its largest ever attack on Iran on June 13, claiming Iran was making rapid progress in developing nuclear weapons. nnIsrael has killed at least 639 so far including senior military figures, nuclear scientists, and civilians, and wounded thousands others a week into its attack on Iran. Iran has launched over 400 missiles in retaliation.nnListen to BFM's full conversation with Dr Shahram on the BFM website, BFM app, Spotify or Apple Podcast.nn How Far Can The Israel-Iran Conflict Go

Tonton semua episod PERCUMA dan EKSKLUSIF di HIGHLIGHT Aku Bukan Ustazah 2 2025: Episod 16 - Berapa Ramai Yang Doktor Dah Berkawan! Tonton semua episod PERCUMA dan EKSKLUSIF di aplikasi iQIYI HIGHLIGHT Pasca Kau Pergi 2025: Episod 1 - Kenapa Dengan Zul Ni? Macam Tak Sihat Je.... Zulkifli seorang bapa yang semakin uzur, cuba mengekalkan keharmonian keluarganya. Azlina pula isterinya yang sangat sibuk dengan kehidupan sosialnya dan sedang merancang untuk bercuti bersama rakan-rakan. Zul jatuh sakit dan dimasukkan ke hospital, Azlina memandang hal itu biasa dan tidak memberitahu anak-anaknya. Pelakon: Johan Asari, Syed Irfan, Liyana Jasmay

Tonton semua episod PERCUMA dan EKSKLUSIF di HIGHLIGHT Budak Tebing : Episod 6 - Ira, Aku Nak Kau Sambung Belajar.. Tonton Mengisahkan tentang Arif yang baru pulang dari menjalani hukuman di Henry Gurney atas kesilapan lampaunya. Dia merupakan anak yang bijak dan menjadi kesayangan ibunya Aida, manakala adiknya Yoyol, menganggap Arif sebagai idola. Semasa kecil, dia dan rakan-rakannya banyak menghabiskan masa di sebuah tebing di kampung mereka sehingga mendapat gelaran budak tebing. Pelakon: Adam Lee, Aedy Ashraf, Bella Dowanna, Eyka Farhana, Fariz Isqandar, Firdaus Ghufran, Syazwan Zulkifly, Amyza Aznan, Alex Afian

Tonton semua episod PERCUMA dan EKSKLUSIF di HIGHLIGHT Baby Papa : Episod 5 - Positif Betul Baby Ni.. Tonton Alisha Kirana Batrisyia perlu menghadapi pelbagai pengalaman mencabar dan melucukan apabila menemani bapanya lakonan Faizal Hussein yang mengalami kemurungan ke Kuala Lumpur. Semua ini untuk memenuhi hasrat nenek Alisha yang telah meninggal dunia yang mahukan mereka bertemu dengan ibu Alisha. Namun, ketibaan mereka menimbulkan banyak isu baru. MCA is dissatisfied with a statement by BN chairperson Ahmad Zahid Hamidi and remains unsure if the coalition will cooperate with the Madani government in the 16th general election GE16. MCA vice-president Tan Teik Cheng said Zahids statement that BN will contest under its own banner did not provide a clear direction for the national polls.

Jabatan Peguam Negara AGC hari ini memfailkan notis rayuan terhadap keputusan Mahkamah Tinggi Kuala Lumpur. Ini selepas mahkamah itu melepas dan membebaskan bekas penyelidik Yusoff Rawther daripada pertuduhan mengedar kanabis dan memiliki dua pistol tiruan pada Khamis lepas. AGC dalam kenyataan hari ini memaklumkan rayuan itu difailkan memandangkan Yusoff dilepas dan dibebaskan tanpa dipanggil membela diri pada akhir kes pendakwaan.

BN chairperson Ahmad Zahid Hamidi has assured that MCA and MIC will be allocated seats to contest in the 16th general election, in an attempt to calm the two component parties amid calls to quit the coalition. The deputy prime minister also reiterated that BN would continue contesting under its logo in the next national polls.

关注 全国总警长拉扎鲁丁宣布听妈妈的话退休同时也宣布母亲村子将拿到百万令吉的政府拨款以提升基础建设对此土著团结党打昔牛汝莪国会议员旺赛夫炮轰安华政府的裙带主义已经达到顶峰 旺赛夫今天发文点出这是极其明显的利益冲突更糟糕的是还动用了执法机构的公帑 他强调如果拉扎鲁丁想帮助自己母亲的家乡则应该用自己的钱 他质问什么时候开始竟然可以选择让自己母亲的村子接受高达100万令吉的公款 更令人痛心的是这种事情竟然是警方所为警方本应是捍卫廉正和良好治理的国家机构 旺赛夫预测政府接下来会用独立遴选委员会来辩护但那只是事后之词

Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has expressed his appreciation and best wishes to Rafizi Ramli for his excellent service as the economy minister. Anwar also emphasised that the decision on Rafizis replacement will be made at a later time.

Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim hari ini mengucapkan selamat maju jaya kepada Rafizi Ramli, yang akan melepaskan jawatan sebagai Menteri Ekonomi bermula esok 17 Jun. Namun, Anwar turut menyatakan harapannya agar Menteri Sumber Asli dan Kelestarian Alam, Nik Nazmi Nik Ahmad, mempertimbangkan semula keputusan beliau untuk turut berundur.

One of the vehicles believed to be involved in the abduction of Pamela Ling was found abandoned near the Thai border several weeks ago, according to her familys legal representative. However, there has been no meaningful update from the authorities, said lawyer Sangeet Kaur Deo. She revealed that Lings family was informed of the vehicles discovery weeks after her abduction on April 9, yet police have reportedly failed to provide updates on the forensic analysis of items found inside the car.

MCA Youth criticised the governments decision to approve RM486,000 expenditure for former prime minister Dr Mahathir Mohamads two-day trip to Japan for the Nikkei Forum last month, questioning its financial priorities at a time of economic strain. Who is really tightening their belts? The people, or you, so-called reformist leaders? MCA Youth central committee member Lee Kok Seng asked. He pointed out that the average Malaysian worker earns less than RM25,000 a year, yet the government could allocate nearly half a million ringgit for seven people to travel abroad for just two days.

Audio Siar Keluar Sekejap Episod 159 menyentuh sebuah tragedi menyayat hati yang mengorbankan 15 mahasiswa UPSI dalam kemalangan bas di lebuhraya Jeli-Gerik. KeluarSekejap membuka ruang kepada Abdul Wafiy Kamarudin, salah seorang mangsa yang terselamat untuk berkongsi pengalaman ngeri yang dilaluinya, kesan trauma serta luahan hati terhadap kegagalan sistem keselamatan jalan raya negara. Episod ini turut membedah kegagalan struktur dan penguatkuasaan yang telah lama membelenggu isu keselamatan pengangkutan awam. Perbincangan bersama Datuk Suret Singh membawa perspektif dasar yang mendalam. Daripada sistem demerit KEJARA yang lemah, lesen PSV pemandu bermasalah yang tidak digantung sehinggalah cadangan penubuhan Kertas Putih Parlimen untuk merombak sistem keselamatan jalan raya secara menyeluruh. Episod diakhiri dengan menyentuh isu kelewatan peluasan SST yang menimbulkan persoalan kecekapan fiskal kerajaan. Ingin jenama anda dikenali oleh ribuan pendengar? Taja episod Keluar Sekejap untuk tahun 2025! Hubungi kami di 6011-1919 1783 atau emel ke commercial untuk maklumat lanjut dan pakej penajaan eksklusif. Presiden Donald Trump berkata tentera Amerika Syarikat telah menyerang tiga lokasi di Iran, namun setakat ini tiada pengesahan rasmi daripada Tehran, menurut laporan media antarabangsa. Kami telah melancarkan serangan yang sangat berjaya ke atas tiga tapak nuklear di Iran, termasuk Fordow, Natanz dan Esfahan, kata Trump dalam satu hantaran di media sosial. President Donald Trump said the US military has struck three sites in Iran, but there has been no immediate acknowledgement from Tehran, according to international media reports. We have completed our very successful attack on the three nuclear sites in Iran, including Fordow, Natanz, and Esfahan, Trump said in a post on social media. All planes are now outside of Iran's space. A full payload of bombs was dropped on the primary site, Fordow. All planes are safely on their way home, he added. credit - President Trump Delivers Address to the Na...

Ahli jawatankuasa Pemuda Warisan, Melvin Lo, yang menyertai perhimpunan Gempur Rasuah Sabah 2.0 di Kota Kinabalu, petang semalam dilihat membuang salinan Akta Pemberi Maklumat 2010 ke dalam tong sampah. Ini kerana dia berasa marah apabila akta itu tidak digunakan dengan betul untuk melindungi pemberi maklumat. Katanya kepada Malaysiakini, SPRM tidak mengambil berat tentang pemberi maklumat dan tidak pernah melindunginya. Lo merujuk kepada laporan pada 18 Jun, yang memetik pemberi maklumat yang dikenali sebagai Albert yang mendedahkan skandal rasuah Sabah, akan didakwa pada 30 Jun, bersama dua lagi Adun Sabah. Kredit: Sabah Entitlement and Equity Now

This was among the demands made at the ongoing Gempur Rasuah Sabah 2.0 rally yesterday organised in Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, which saw over 100 people attending. Credit:

PKR MP Rafizi Ramli believes that there is no reason for him to remain in the cabinet if the ministerial position comes at the cost of him losing his ability to voice certain views. Speaking on the first episode of his Yang Berhenti Menteri podcast last night, Rafizi said he would merely be a lame duck minister if he had opted to stay on after losing the PKR deputy presidency race to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahims daughter, Nurul Izzah. Bukit Amans Special Branch director Khalid Ismail has been appointed as the new inspector-general of police. He is taking over from Razarudin Husain, whose two-year contract as the IGP expires this Sunday. A duty handover ceremony was held at the Kuala Lumpur Police Training Centre today to mark the transition of leadership.

Pengarah Cawangan Khas Bukit Aman, Mohd Khalid Ismail, dilantik sebagai Ketua Polis Negara yang baru bagi menggantikan Razarudin Husain hari ini. Razarudin akan menamatkan kontraknya sebagai pegawai tertinggi Polis Diraja Malaysia PDRM pada Ahad ini. Majlis serah terima tugas berlangsung di Pulapol disaksikan Menteri Dalam Negeri Saifuddin Nasution Ismail. Sementara itu, Razarudin dilihat beberapa kali menahan sebak ketika menyampaikan ucapan terakhirnya dengan menutup tirai lebih 42 tahun khidmat dalam PDRM. Sumber video: 1303192941420083

KiniNews The High Court in Kuala Lumpur today granted a discharge not amounting to an acquittal DNAA to former prime minister Najib Abdul Razak today over three money laundering charges involving RM27 million from SRC International Sdn Bhd. Judge K Muniandy made the ruling after allowing Najibs application for the DNAA. In his ruling, Muniandy noted that the case against Najib has been pending since 2019 without a single witness being called. Instead, it has been marked by persistent postponements, indicating that the prosecution is not prepared to proceed. In a press conference outside the court, Najib's lawyer Shafee Abdullah said Najib is happy because the number of cases he is facing has decreased and now he can concentrate on 1MDB alone. Meanwhile, in a separate story, PKR MP Rafizi Ramli said that while he respected Najibs right to apply for a DNAA - given the long wait since 2019 - and the courts decision to allow the application, he could not understand why the prosecution had taken so long to prepare the necessary documents to proceed with the case. He urged the prosecution to explain the weakness that led the court to grant the DNAA and to refile the charges as soon as possible. ___________________ Share this news! Mahajoth Singh, a lawyer representing the whistleblower in the Sabah corruption scandal has hit out at MACC chief Azam Baki and its prosecution director, Wan Shaharuddin Wan Ladin, for denying his client protection as provided under the Whistleblower Protection Act 2010. He said the Whistleblower Act belongs in a trash can if MACCs interpretation of the law is accepted. Mahajoth was responding to media comments made by Azam and Wan Shaharuddin yesterday.

Ratusan berarak dari bangunan Lembaga Tabung Haji TH ke kedutaan Amerika Syarikat AS di ibu negara selepas sembahyang Jumaat hari ini bagi menyatakan bantahan terhadap serangan Israel ke atas Palestin dan Iran. Perhimpunan aman tersebut digerakkan Majlis Perundingan Pertubuhan Islam Malaysia Mapim susulan konflik terbaru yang tercetus selepas Israel menyerang Iran. Himpunan hari ini juga bagi menyatakan sokongan kepada Iran dan Palestin yang menjadi mangsa rejim Zionis, selain mendesak Amerika Syarikat supaya tidak campur tangan serta menghentikan perperangan. Bagaimanapun, laporan itu tidak mendedahkan identiti menteri berkenaan.

PKR MP Rafizi Ramli has urged the prosecution to explain the weakness that led the Kuala Lumpur High Court to grant a discharge not amounting to an acquittal DNAA to former prime minister Najib Abdul Razak in his SRC International Sdn Bhd money laundering case. He said that while he respected Najibs right to apply for a DNAA - given the long wait since 2019 - and the courts decision to allow the application, he could not understand why the prosecution had taken so long to prepare the necessary documents to proceed with the case.

The goods and services tax GST is an efficient and transparent taxation system, but it is not yet suitable for re-implementation because the rakyats income threshold is still low, said Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. Anwar, who is also the finance minister, said the government did not completely reject the proposal to re-implement the GST, but the ability of low-income people must be taken into account first because the taxation system has a comprehensive impact.

Rafizi Ramli mengkritik pihak pendakwaan dalam kes pengubahan wang haram melibatkan dana syarikat SRC International Sdn Bhd yang menyaksikan Najib Razak dilepas tanpa dibebaskan DNAA. Rafizi berkata dia menghormati keputusan mahkamah hari ini namun tidak faham dengan pihak pendakwa raya yang mengambil masa begitu lama menyiapkan dokumen untuk memulakan kes. Rafizi berkata, dari pengalamannya mengkaji dan mendedahkan skandal, SRC mempunyai bukti aliran tunai lebih jelas.

Several locations in Selangor were badly hit by flash floods following heavy rain this morning. Based on social media postings, the affected areas include Bukit Kemuning and Sri Muda in Shah Alam, and Jalan Kebun in Klang. According to a Facebook user, many motorcyclists were stuck at the Kota Kemuning toll plaza in Shah Alam as several roads were inundated. A livestream on TikTok showed that a housing area in Bukit Kemuning, located at Section 32 Shah Alam, was hit by a knee-deep flood.

Beberapa kawasan di Selangor dilanda banjir kilat teruk pagi ini susulan hujan lebat yang berpanjangan. Berdasarkan hantaran di media sosial, antara kawasan yang terjejas termasuk Bukit Kemuning dan Sri Muda di Shah Alam, serta Jalan Kebun di Klang. Menurut seorang pengguna Facebook, ramai penunggang motosikal terkandas di Plaza Tol Kota Kemuning di Shah Alam apabila beberapa laluan dinaiki air. Satu siaran langsung di TikTok menunjukkan kawasan perumahan di Bukit Kemuning, Seksyen 32 Shah Alam, dilanda banjir sedalam paras lutut.

Rumah milik keluarga mentua Ketua Pembangkang, Hamzah Zainudin, di Kampung Sungai Rapat Tambahan di Ipoh, Perak musnah dalam kebakaran pada 9.19 malam tadi. Dalam kejadian itu, ibu mentua beliau, Salmiah Nyakk Matt, 84, maut di lokasi manakala bapa mentuanya, Abdul Ghani Ngah, 83, mengalami sesak nafas. Siasatan lanjut sedang dijalankan bagi mengenal pasti punca kebakaran.

Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim berkata kerajaan berjaya mengurangkan jumlah hutang negara sebanyak RM20 bilion sejak mengambil alih pentadbiran pada tahun 2020. Menurut beliau, pengurangan hutang negara memerlukan strategi jangka panjang menerusi pengurusan berhemah dan berperingkat oleh kerajaan. Sumber video: 1ay3sqkdrb

In a statement posted on his official Facebook page, Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah said that the misuse of the word Islam in the name and publications of SIS Forum Malaysia could cause confusion among the Muslim community.

Sultan Selangor, Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah menzahirkan kekecewaan dan dukacita dengan sebahagian keputusan Mahkamah Persekutuan semalam. Ia berkenaan dengan mahkamah memutuskan fatwa Selangor yang mengisytihar Sisters in Islam SIS sebagai sesat pada 2014 dibatalkan kerana fatwa itu hanya boleh terpakai kepada individu dan bukan sesebuah pertubuhan. Sultan Sharafuddin menggesa SIS tidak lagi menggunakan perkataan Sisters in Islam ke atas apa juga bentuk penerbitan dan platform yang berkaitan dengan mereka.

The Kuala Lumpur High Court has granted a discharge not amounting to an acquittal DNAA to former premier Najib Abdul Razak over three money laundering charges involving RM27 million from SRC International Sdn Bhd. Najibs lawyer, Shafee Abdullah, argued last week that it was unjust to keep his client in limbo without a confirmed trial date, especially since the prosecution could not specify when they would be able to compile the exhibits from the earlier SRC trial. High Court judge K Muniandy stated that the DNAA, which temporarily drops the charges, does not prejudice the prosecution as they remain free to refile charges against Najib when ready.

Najib Razak hari ini dilepas tanpa dibebaskan DNAA daripada tiga pertuduhan pengubahan wang haram membabitkan RM27 juta dana SRC International Sdn Bhd. Hakim Mahkamah Tinggi Kuala Lumpur K Muniandy membenarkan permohonan yang dikemukakan bekas perdana menteri itu pagi ini. Hakim menjelaskan bahawa kes berkenaan berlanjutan begitu lama sejak 2019, manakala pihak pendakwaan dianggap tidak bersedia memulakan perbicaraan kes itu dalam masa terdekat. Oleh itu katanya, ia adalah zalim dan tidak sah membiarkan pertuduhan tergantung untuk tempoh yang tidak menentu.

KiniNews Sisters in Islam SIS expressed gratitude and relief after the Federal Court allowed its appeal to challenge a Selangor Islamic Religious Council Mais fatwa declaring the organisation deviant. Speaking to reporters immediately after todays court decision, SIS executive director Rozana Isa said the ruling proves they have a legitimate right under the Federal Constitution to voice their views and champion Muslim womens rights in Malaysia. For nearly 11 years, we have gone through this process to seek justice, and finally we have received confirmation that our organisation has rights protected by the Federal Constitution to continue speaking out, she said. Meanwhile, in a separate story, the lawyer representing Yusoff Rawther has taken a swipe at PKR Youth members allegedly masquerading as NGOs after a police report was lodged against the former research assistant to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim on Thursday strongly condemned the recent Israeli airstrikes on Iranian territory, describing them as punitive and unprovoked acts that violate international law and undermine diplomatic efforts. Anwar said the Israeli attacks were clearly intended to derail ongoing talks and shatter hopes for a peaceful resolution in the region.

Beliau berkata demikian ketika menyampaikan ucap tama pada Persidangan Meja Bulat Asia Pasifik Ke-38. Sumber video: 1et5hpcqyn

Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim hari ini mengecam serangan udara Israel ke atas wilayah Iran baru-baru ini dengan menyifatkan ia sebagai tindakan punitif dan tanpa provokasi yang mencabuli undang-undang antarabangsa serta menggagalkan usaha diplomatik. Anwar berkata, serangan itu jelas bertujuan menggagalkan rundingan yang sedang berlangsung dan menghancurkan harapan untuk penyelesaian damai di rantau terbabit. Sumber video: 1et5hpcqyn

The Federal Courts ruling today in favour of the Sisters in Islam SIS organisation in its challenge against a fatwa issued by Selangor religious authorities will be thoroughly reviewed, said Naim Mokhtar. The minister in the Prime Ministers Department Religious Affairs stressed that the review is necessary to ensure the long-term stability of fatwa institutions.

Keputusan Mahkamah Persekutuan hari ini membuktikan fatwa berkaitan amalan serta pendapat pluralisme dan liberalisme adalah haram dan tidak boleh diamalkan yang dikeluarkan oleh pihak berkuasa agama Islam Selangor, adalah sah. Justeru peguam kanan, Mohamed Haniff Khatri Abdulla berkata, tiada keperluan untuk Majlis Fatwa Kebangsaan mahupun Jawatankuasa Fatwa Negeri meminda sedikit fatwa berkenaan. Sumber Video:

Kerajaan akan meneliti keputusan mahkamah yang memihak kepada Sisters In Islam SIS bagi memastikan kewibawaan fatwa tidak akan terjejas dalam jangka panjang. Menteri di Jabatan Perdana Menteri Hal Ehwal Agama Mohd Naim Mokhtar berkata dia menghormati prinsip kedaulatan undang-undang dan keputusan kehakiman yang dibuat oleh Mahkamah Persekutuan hari ini. Namun beliau menegaskan bahawa fatwa tetap memainkan peranan penting dalam membimbing umat Islam dalam isu-isu semasa yang memerlukan panduan syariah.

被贴上异端标签十年后伊斯兰姐妹会SIS终于在联邦法院翻案 联邦法院今天推翻雪州宗教机构对伊斯兰姐妹会的异端标签姐妹会表示这是属于全体马来西亚人的胜利 联邦法院法院以3比1的多数裁决认定宗教机构只能管辖穆斯林个体撤销将姐妹会列为异端的雪州法规 这起案件源于2014年雪州宗教理事会指控姐妹会宣扬自由主义多元主义背离教义 姐妹会随即申请司法审核挑战这项标签违宪 案件一路打到联邦法院终于在今天获得平反法庭确认她们的斗争是联邦宪法所保障的基本权利 姐妹会强调这并不是一场反宗教的斗争而是对缺乏公正程序的挑战 她们也直言如果以伊斯兰为政策基础却导致歧视女性侵犯自由公民有权提出司法审核

Former finance minister Daim Zainuddins widow has urged the Independent Police Conduct Commission IPCC to probe the force over its alleged inaction on her complaint against Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. Na'imah Abdul Khalid said that she went to the police last year to report Anwar for allegedly abusing his power by instructing the MACC to investigate Daim, former Prime Minister Dr Mahathir Mohamad, and Mahathir's sons. This came after Bloombergs report on Sept 26 last year detailing claims of political interference in the graftbuster's operations.

Pemberi maklumat skandal rasuah Ahli Dewan Undangan Negeri Adun Sabah turut akan didakwa di mahkamah, bulan ini. Perkara itu disahkan oleh Ketua Pesuruhjaya SPRM, Azam Baki seperti dipetik Harian Metro hari ini. Menurut Azam, arahan untuk mendakwanya selepas siasatan mendapati pemberi maklumat itu turut terbabit aktif dalam transaksi rasuah. Pemberi maklumat terbabit antara tiga individu yang akan didakwa di Mahkamah Kota Kinabalu pada 30 Jun ini.

Naimah Khalid membuat aduan kepada Suruhanjaya Bebas Tatakelakuan Polis IPCC berhubung dakwaan kegagalan polis bertindak laporan dibuatnya tahun lalu mengenai artikel Bloomberg. Artikel itu menyentuh siasatan terhadap urusan Allahyarham suaminya Daim Zainuddin yang juga bekas menteri kewangan. Beliau mendakwa dalam tempoh sembilan bulan sejak laporan itu dibuat di Balai Polis Petaling Jaya, pihak berkuasa itu tidak pernah menghubunginya bagi siasatan lanjut. Dalam satu artikel diterbitkan September lalu, Bloomberg memetik sumber mendakwa Ketua Pesuruhjaya SPRM, Azam Baki, memberitahu pegawai-pegawai agensi itu bahawa arahan menyiasat Daim serta bekas perdana menteri Dr Mahathir Mohamad dan anak-anaknya datang daripada Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim sendiri.

经济部部长拉菲兹和环境部部长聂纳兹米在公正党党选落败后双双辞职巫统领袖趁机冷嘲热讽还建议他们组建新政党 巫统最高理事卜艾今天在面子书发文说拉菲兹和聂纳兹米孤傲难成气候 卜艾语带讽刺地建议两人和前巫统领袖凯里前宣传主任沙刘能源部的公正党副部长阿克玛统民党麻坡国会议员赛沙迪土团党打昔牛汝莪议员旺赛夫以及全民党主席兼如楼议员孙伟瑄一起成立新政党 卜艾反讽说这些同类型的人物不如一起另起炉灶 他说就像足球一样当明星球员聚集在一起球队就会强大并且长年称霸赛场 卜艾还表示这群人如果联手握有七到十席国会议席在悬峙国会时能发挥关键影响力而且也掌握强大的谈判条件 不过卜艾也讽刺说这些人虽然名气响亮却立场各异背景强势恐怕合作不来

The Federal Court has ruled that the Selangor religious authorities were wrong to issue a fatwa declaring the Sisters in Islam SIS organisation as deviant and contrary to Islamic teachings. In a 3-1 majority decision, the panel of four judges chaired by Chief Justice Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat allowed the womens rights groups appeal to set aside the appellate court and High Courts decisions on a 2014 fatwa. However, part of the fatwa was upheld with the court ruling it was within the Selangor religious authorities' purview to issue the fatwa declaring any individual who subscribed to liberalism and religious pluralism as deviant and contrary to Islamic teachings.

Bekas Menteri Ekonomi, Rafizi Ramli, ahli Parlimen Muar, Syed Saddiq serta bekas Menteri Kesihatan Khairy Jamaludin antara nama yang dicadang untuk membentuk satu parti politik baharu. Ahli Majlis Kerja Tertinggi MKT Umno, Mohd Puad Zarkashi menggunakan analogi bola sepak bagi cadangan parti politik baru itu. Katanya dalam satu hantaran di Facebook, gabungan pemimpin yang mempunyai potensi dalam arena politik kebiasaannya akan menjadi kuat dan memenangi siri pilihan raya.

Mahkamah Persekutuan pagi ini membenarkan permohonan Sisters in Islam SIS membatalkan fatwa pihak berkuasa agama Islam Selangor yang mengisytiharkan pertubuhan itu sesat dan menyeleweng daripada ajaran Islam yang diwartakan 11 tahun lalu. Ini kerana fatwa itu hanya terpakai kepada orang perseorangan beragama Islam dan bukannya syarikat atau pertubuhan. Mahkamah turut menyatakan syarikat sebagai entiti buatan tidak mempunyai kapasiti untuk bertaubat seperti disarankan dalam fatwa itu.

An Umno supreme council member suggested that former Umno leader Khairy Jamaluddin, PKR MP Rafizi Ramli, and others should form a party. It would be nice if Rafizi, Khairy, Nik Nazmi Nik Ahmad, Shahril Hamdan, Akmal Nasir, Syed Saddiq Syed Abdul Rahman, Wan Saiful Wan Jan, and Larry Sng form a new party together. In football, when star players come together, the team turns formidable and becomes champions for years, said Puad Zarkashi.

The lawyer representing Yusoff Rawther has taken a swipe at PKR Youth members allegedly masquerading as NGOs after a police report was lodged against the former research assistant to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. This was following a group of NGOs lodging a police report accusing Yusoff of having links to the Israeli intelligence agency, Mossad.

Peguam Muhammad Yusoff Rawther membidas beberapa individu mendakwa mewakili sebuah NGO selepas mereka membuat laporan polis. Laporan polis tersebut mereka mengaitkan bekas pembantu penyelidik Anwar Ibrahim itu mempunyai kaitan dengan agensi perisikan Israel, Mossad. Kata Rafique Rashid Ali, individu yang mengetuai NGO Nadi Gemilang Amal berkenaan dikenali sebagai Dzul Hilmi Zainol merupakan exco Pemuda PKR AMK.

Backed by government parties, 10 NGOs have united to oppose former prime minister Dr Mahathir Mohamads big umbrella to restore Malay political dominance. The group banded under the Malaysian Community Welfare Movement GKUM, with its chairperson Amidi Abdul Manan stating this was in response to the big umbrella, which he said stemmed from narrow racial politics. Through this new movement, he explained, national unity remains a cornerstone that cannot be sidelined, damaged, or manipulated.

Mendapat sokongan parti-parti dalam kerajaan Madani, sejumlah 10 NGO bergabung di bawah Gerakan Kesejahteraan Umat Malaysia GKUM dalam usaha menolak payung besar pimpinan Dr Mahathir Mohamad. Pengerusi GKUM Amidi Abdul Manan berkata mereka menolak gerakan yang dinamakan sebagai Sekretariat Orang Melayu itu kerana ia bertitik tolak daripada politik kebangsaan yang sempit. Atas kesedaran itu, katanya, perpaduan rakyat adalah teras yang tidak boleh diketepikan, dirosakkan mahupun dipermainkan. Pada 4 Jun lalu, Dr Mahathir mengumumkan penubuhan jawatankuasa sekretariat orang Melayu bagi menghimpunkan orang Melayu di bawah satu payung besar. Sumber video: 164qamvca1

KiniNews The whistleblower who exposed the Sabah corruption scandal is now set to be charged on June 30, a move his lawyer, Mahajoth Singh, described as both shocking and disappointing. My clients disclosures, at serious personal risk, have greatly benefited the public interest. It is shocking and disappointing that my client is to be rewarded with being charged with a criminal offence, Mahajoth said. Earlier today, MACC chief commissioner Azam Baki said the agency will charge two Sabah assemblypersons and a civilian in court soon. Meanwhile, in a separate story, an aide to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, in his capacity as finance minister, said the government is open to reviewing the expanded sales and service tax SST, which will take effect from July 1. Kamil Abdul Munim reportedly said the legislation is not divine law, its human legislation, so, theres no issue if adjustments or improvements are needed. ___________________ Share this news! Amid the escalation between Iran and Israel, US President Donald Trump has urged Iranian Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei to surrender unconditionally. He also warned Khamenei that he knows where he is hiding. We know exactly where the so-called supreme leader is hiding. He is an easy target, but is safe there - We are not going to take him out kill!, at least not for now," he said.

Bersatu Youth has announced it will join PAS Turun Anwar rally on July 26, saying people have the right to reject policies that will further weigh down the already struggling masses. Any policies that would burden the rakyat should be rejected, especially if it is implemented without transparency and not premised on ground reality. We will mobilise all our members from across the nation for the rally, said its information chief Harris Idaham Rashid.

Pemuda Bersatu Armada mengumumkan bahawa mereka akan menyertai perhimpunan 'Turun Anwar' yang diterajui PAS pada 26 Julai ini di Kuala Lumpur. Menurut Armada, penyertaan itu atas pendirian bahawa sebarang dasar ekonomi yang membebankan rakyat wajar ditolak. Ini, kata ketua penerangannya Harris Idaham Rashid, khususnya jika ia dilaksana tanpa ketelusan dan tidak berpaksikan realiti kehidupan rakyat.
行动党将于下星期一召开党选后的第一场中委会会议原本聚焦党务改革但随着赵明福命案出现新进展这场会议可能也会讨论赵明福案件 据当今大马了解中委会成员已接获6月23日的会议通知 虽然正式议程尚未公布但至少有一名中委认为赵明福案件很可能会带上会议讨论 两名非中委的行动党领袖接受访问时也认为党高层必须正面回应这件事

Muda acting president Amira Aisya Abdul Aziz gave her statement to the police today over her involvement in an anti-graft rally last month. Speaking to the media later, Amira criticised the probe against her as one which goes against the right to free speech as provided under Article 10 of the Federal Constitution. She further raised concerns over whether the rakyat might be subjected to similar police investigations if they air their grievances with the government.

MACC will charge two Sabah assemblypersons and a civilian in court soon, believed to be linked to the mineral mining licence corruption scandal that has rocked the state since an exposé last year. I would like to state that there are two suspects from among the assemblypersons and one civilian in the process of being arrested, and we are informing them of their court dates," said MACC chief commissioner Azam Baki. I wont disclose the exact dates until the process is completed, but I am confident they will be charged in court this month, he added.
统民党Muda代主席阿美拉因为日前在集会上发表抗议反贪会主席阿占巴基续任的言论而在今天被警方传召问话 阿美拉步出金马警局后控诉希盟执政前也曾反对阿占巴基但为何他们续任后却变了样 婆罗洲曼迪里组织主任黄勤辉则批评首相安华虚伪 他说安华曾鼓励年轻人反对贪腐但如今却打压反对阿占巴基的集会人士

Presiden Amerika Syarikat AS Donald Trump menggesa Iran supaya menyerah diri tanpa syarat dan memberi amaran bahawa kesabaran negaranya semakin tipis. Namun dia menegaskan tiada niat untuk membunuh pemimpin tertinggi Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei "buat masa ini" ketika perang udara antara Israel dan negara itu memasuki hari keenam. Kenyataan Trump yang disampaikan melalui media sosial menggambarkan pendirian lebih agresif akan diambil terhadap Iran. Terdahulu, Ayatollah Khamenei mengisytiharkan bahawa pertempuran sebenar telah bermula dan Iran tidak akan berundur dalam satu ucapan di televisyen negara.

An aide to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, in his capacity as finance minister, today said the government is open to reviewing the expanded sales and service tax SST, which will take effect from July 1. Kamil Abdul Munim reportedly said the legislation is not divine law, and so while the new rates will continue to be enforced, future changes remain possible if necessary.

SPRM akan mendakwa dua Ahli Dewan Undangan Negeri Adun Sabah dan seorang awam di mahkamah pada bulan ini. Dakwaan itu dipercayai susulan pendedahan skandal rasuah melibatkan Adun Sabah pada tahun lalu, berkaitan lesen perlombongan mineral di negeri itu. Ketua Pesuruhjaya SPRM, Azam Baki berkata, ketika ini SPRM dalam proses tangkapan dan pemakluman kepada suspek untuk menetapkan tarikh kehadiran mereka ke mahkamah.

Pemangku Presiden Muda, Amira Aisya Abdul Aziz hadir ke IPD Dang Wangi pagi ini susulan penglibatannya dalam perhimpunan anti-rasuah bulan lalu. Amira dipanggil polis susulan ucapannya dalam perhimpunan pada 24 Mei lalu yang menuntut Ketua Pesuruhjaya SPRM, Azam Baki meletakkan jawatan. "Himpunan Rakyat Benci Rasuah 2.0" anjuran Sekretariat Rakyat Benci Rasuah, yang bertujuan mendesak kerajaan mempercepat reformasi institusi dalam memerangi rasuah. Amira membidas siasatan terhadapnya dan menyifatkan tindakan itu bertentangan dengan hak kebebasan bersuara.

Kumpulan belia bebas Mandiri mengecam Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim atas sikap yang disifatkannya sebagai hipokrit berhubung anak muda yang bersuara menentang rasuah di negara ini. Pengarah Mandiri, Wong Kueng Hui, meluahkan rasa kesal terhadap siasatan polis terhadap Pemangku Presiden Muda, Amira Aisya Abdul Aziz, susulan penglibatannya dalam perhimpunan anti-rasuah bulan lalu. Wong memetik kenyataan Anwar sebelum ini yang menggesa anak muda agar berani memerangi rasuah. Dia berkata demikian kepada media selepas menemani Amira memberi keterangan di Ibu Pejabat Polis Daerah Dang Wangi hari ini.

Former prime minister Muhyiddin Yassin has hit out at the government over the sales and service tax SST expansion. He said the claim that the Madani government only taxes the ultra-rich and redistributes it to the poor like Robin Hood is clearly a lie.

Seorang pegawai Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim di Kementerian Kewangan berkata kerajaan terbuka untuk menyemak semula peluasan cukai jualan dan perkhidmatan SST, yang akan berkuat kuasa 1 Julai ini. Setiausaha politik Anwar, Kamil Abdul Munim dilaporkan berkata peluasan SST bukan undang-undang Tuhan dan ia boleh diteliti semula jika ada keperluan. Memetik Sinar Harian yang memetik Kamil sebagai berkata setiap dasar akan menimbulkan keluhan pada peringkat awal dan itu perkara biasa. Namun katanya kerajaan akan pastikan ia diselaraskan supaya tidak membebankan majoriti rakyat.

随着彭亨王室成员夜店伤人案曝光巫青团长艾科玛公开表态无论王室成员还是平民犯法就该受罚 根据流传的报案书5月8日清晨一名彭亨王室成员在关丹的夜店里指示随从用玻璃酒壶攻击受害者头部接着还自己拿出折叠刀刺伤对方臀部导致男子重伤送院 受害者是一名华裔男子艾科玛在TikTok影片中回应自己是为了正义发声不分种族 艾科玛还赞扬彭亨王储东姑哈山纳过去曾公开要求所有违法者都应被公正对待 这并非第一宗彭亨王室成员涉及伤人案 去年彭亨苏丹阿都拉的侄子东姑艾迪Tengku Eddie Akasya Tengku Abd Rahman和另外4人就因涉嫌攻击筑路工人被控持械伤人 当时东姑哈山纳也罕见发文要求警方展开透明调查绝不偏袒

Presiden PAS Abdul Hadi Awang selamat menjalani satu prosedur pembedahan jantung di Institut Jantung Negara IJN semalam. Perkara itu disahkan Timbalannya Tuan Ibrahim Tuan Man, sambil menyifatkan kejayaan pembedahan itu bukti negara memiliki kepakaran dan fasiliti perubatan setanding negara maju. Tuan Ibrahim berkata beberapa pimpinan kanan parti termasuk dirinya diberi taklimat oleh pasukan pakar IJN yang telah menunjukkan komitmen tinggi dalam melaksanakan pembedahan berkenaan.

As Israeli and Iranian forces continue to trade deadly strikes on the fifth day since increased tensions between the two long-time foes, calls for unity among the global Muslim community were issued from Kuala Lumpur. The delegation, led by local civil society leaders, held a more than hour-long meeting with ambassador Valiollah Mohammadi Nasrabadi at the Iranian embassy in Kuala Lumpur yesterday, following the latest round of Israeli strikes on the republic, a long-time backer of Palestinian resistance in Gaza.

Sejumlah NGO serta pemimpin beberapa parti politik berkumpul di kedutaan Iran di Kuala Lumpur hari ini bagi menyatakan solidariti terhadap republik itu yang kini berdepan konflik dengan Israel. Mereka mengadakan pertemuan lebih sejam dengan Duta Iran, Valiollah Mohammadi Nasrabadi, di tengah serangan terbaru Israel ke atas negara itu. Mereka antara lain menyuarakan sokongan kepada Iran dalam usaha mempertahankan negaranya selain mengecam campur tangan Amerika Syarikat AS.

KiniNews Natural Resources and Environmental Sustainability Minister Nik Nazmi Nik Ahmad appears adamant on leaving the ministry, despite Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim expressing hopes he would stay on. Nik Nazmi said that while he does have the option to remain in his ministerial position, he has made the difficult decision to step down for a larger consideration concerning PKRs mandate. The partys mandate is vital for broader reform. I did have the option to stay, but Ive chosen to resign as minister, said the Setiawangsa MP. Ikuti perjalanan Rafizi Ramli, dari jurutera muda yang terinspirasi oleh Reformasi 1999, ke pentas pendedahan skandal besar negara, dan akhirnya ke jawatan Menteri Ekonomi. Termasuk insiden 'merajuk' dengan Anwar Ibrahim pada 2019 yang hampir mengubah hala tuju politiknya. Kini, selepas meletak jawatan, apakah sejarah seterusnya dalam perjuangannya? Rafizi Ramli has promised to burn bakar and enlighten beri pencerahan in his new podcast titled YBM, which stands for Yang Berhenti Menteri the one who quit as minister. "Im no longer bound by government ethics and confidentiality. So, Im free to speak, he said. Rafizi previously created and hosted his initial podcast programme called Yang Bakar Menteri, which also uses the acronym YBM.

Ahli perniagaan terkenal, Ameer Ali Mydin, menganggap langkah kerajaan mengenakan cukai jualan dan perkhidmatan SST ke atas buah-buahan import sebagai sesuatu yang "tidak masuk akal." Kata Pengarah Urusan Mydin Mohamed Holdings Bhd itu, tidak seperti tanggapan sesetengah orang, ada antara buah-buahan import itu turut digunakan oleh rakyat berpendapatan rendah. Katanya kepada Malaysiakini, buah-buahan seperti epal dan oren malah pisang menjadi makanan golongan B40.

Former MIC president G Palanivel died today. He was 76. MIC vice-president T Murugiah confirmed with Bernama that the former natural resources and environment minister died at the Kuala Lumpur Hospital at 8am.

Menteri Sumber Asli dan Kelestarian Alam, Nik Nazmi Nik Ahmad, hari ini memberi bayangan bahawa dia tidak akan mengubah keputusannya untuk berundur dari jawatan menteri. Ini walaupun Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim masih memberikan tempoh untuk mempertimbangkan keputusan tersebut. Perletakan jawatan Nik Nazmi berkuat kuasa mulai 4 Julai nanti.

Umno Youth chief Dr Akmal Saleh has urged the authorities to act against a Pahang royal who was implicated in a knife attack against a 30-year-old man recently. Umno Youth strictly urges the attorney-general to charge the royal and get him a severe punishment if there is a case against him. The police mentioned that they have completed their investigations," he said in a speech uploaded on TikTok yesterday.

Mydin Mohamed Holdings Bhd managing director Ameer Ali Mydin criticised the governments move to impose the sales and service tax SST on imported fruits, calling it nonsensical. Ameer argued that, contrary to popular belief, some imported fruits are also consumed by low-income groups and should be considered essential food items. I strongly disagree, and it makes no sense to impose SST on basic fruits like apples, oranges, bananas, and others. These are foods for the B40 low-income group, he told Malaysiakini.

Pemangku presiden Muda Amira Aisya Abd Aziz, hari ini menempelak kerajaan pimpinan Perdana Menteri Anwar Ibrahim. Amira mendakwa Anwar cuba mengalihkan fokus rakyat dengan naratif yang mengelirukan berhubung pelaksanaan cukai SST ke atas barangan makanan asas import. Dia menyindir kenyataan Anwar merangkap menteri kewangan yang menyebut "orang kaya nak makan avokado bayarlah lebih sikit."

As internal pressure mounts for MCA to leave BN and the Anwar Ibrahim-led government, Umno leaders have urged the party to consider its political relevance and present-day realities. Umno supreme council member Puad Zarkashi said it should not be difficult for MCA to understand the rationale behind BNs cooperation with Pakatan Harapan and other components of the unity government. While MCA has every right to determine its political direction, Puad warned that leaving BN would be akin to digging its own grave.

Ketua Pemuda Umno Dr Akmal Saleh menggesa pihak berkuasa bertindak terhadap seorang kerabat. Kerabat dari Pahang itu didakwa terbabit dalam kes menikam seorang lelaki berusia 30 tahun baru-baru ini. Dalam laporan polis yang dibuat pada 8 Jun lalu, kejadian serangan itu dikatakan berlaku pada 8 Mei lalu di sebuah kelab malam di Kuantan.

The prosecutors in the drug trafficking and imitation firearm possession charges against Yusoff Rawther have filed an appeal against his acquittal. The Attorney-General's Chambers referred to Kuala Lumpur High Court judge Jamil Hussin's verdict on June 12 that the prosecution had failed to establish a prima facie case against the former aide of Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim on both charges. "After taking into consideration the Kuala Lumpur High Court judge's decision, the AGC has filed an Appeal Notice to appeal the discharge and acquittal," said the AGG.

Doa Malam Isnin Pengusir Jin dan Setan Doa Pembuka Rezeki. Doa Malam Isnin bukan sekadar permulaan minggu dalam kalendar, tetapi juga saat yang sangat sesuai untuk memulakan minggu dengan kekuatan rohani. Dalam Islam, setiap malam mempunyai keistimewaan tersendiri, dan malam Isnin menjadi peluang terbaik untuk mengangkat tangan memohon pertolongan Allah. Amalan membaca doa malam Isnin telah diamalkan oleh ramai ulama dan orang soleh sebagai benteng perlindungan daripada jin, syaitan, dan pembuka jalan rezeki. Doa malam Isnin mengandungi pelbagai faedah rohani dan duniawi. Dengan menyebut nama Allah dan bersandar kepada ayat-ayat serta doa yang bersumberkan Al-Quran dan hadith, seseorang akan merasai ketenangan dalam jiwa. Doa-doa seperti Ayat Kursi, Surah Al-Ikhlas, Al-Falaq dan An-Naas amat digalakkan dibaca pada malam ini untuk melindungi diri dan keluarga daripada gangguan makhluk halus. Selain sebagai pengusir jin dan setan, doa malam Isnin juga terkenal sebagai doa pembuka pintu rezeki. Rezeki bukan sekadar wang ringgit, tetapi juga meliputi kesihatan, kebahagiaan, kelapangan masa, dan keberkatan dalam keluarga. Membaca doa tertentu pada malam Isnin dengan ikhlas mampu membuka jalan keluar daripada kesempitan hidup, menjemput pertolongan Allah dalam segala urusan. Bagi mereka yang sering berasa sempit rezeki, sering ditimpa musibah atau gangguan rohani, malam Isnin adalah waktu yang sesuai untuk bermunajat. Nabi Muhammad ﷺ sendiri pernah mengajarkan bahawa doa yang dibaca pada malam hari lebih mudah dikabulkan, terutama bila disertai dengan solat tahajud dan taubat nasuha. Inilah kekuatan spiritual yang sering dilupakan oleh manusia moden. Dari sudut kelebihan perlindungan, doa malam Isnin yang diamalkan secara konsisten mampu menjadi ruqyah harian yang mencegah gangguan sihir, santau dan jin. Banyak kes menunjukkan individu yang mengamalkan zikir dan doa tertentu secara tetap mengalami perubahan positif dari segi emosi, tidur malam lebih lena, dan semangat hidup yang meningkat. Antara amalan yang boleh disertakan pada malam Isnin termasuk membaca Surah Yasin, istighfar 100 kali, selawat ke atas Nabi, serta doa rezeki seperti: "Allahumma iftah lana abwaban rizqika wa anzil alayna barakataka ya arhamar rahimin." Doa ini, jika diamalkan dengan hati yang yakin dan khusyuk, menjadi magnet tarikan rezeki dalam pelbagai bentuk. Dari sudut energi spiritual, malam Isnin adalah masa untuk reset jiwa. Sesiapa yang memulakan minggu dengan doa dan tawakal akan melihat perubahan besar dalam cara hidupnya. Rezeki akan terasa lebih mencurah, fikiran lebih jernih, dan hati lebih lapang. Ini kerana doa membuka hubungan antara hamba dan Tuhannya, dan Allah tidak akan mengecewakan doa orang yang bersungguh-sungguh. Menghalau gangguan makhluk halus bukan semata-mata dengan rukyah fizikal, tetapi juga memerlukan benteng dari dalam diri. Doa malam Isnin sebagai pengusir jin dan syaitan berfungsi sebagai perisai yang melindungi hati dan rumah daripada aura negatif, sihir dan kebencian. Sebaiknya dibaca bersama keluarga agar seluruh rumah dilindungi rahmat. Dalam dunia yang penuh tekanan dan persaingan hari ini, ramai yang terlupa bahawa sumber kejayaan sebenar datang daripada Allah. Memulakan minggu dengan doa malam Isnin yang pembuka rezeki adalah langkah bijak untuk membina minggu yang tenang, produktif dan diberkati. Ia bukan sekadar amalan spiritual, tetapi strategi kehidupan. Sebagai penutup, jadikanlah malam Isnin sebagai titik mula perubahan hidup. Jika setiap minggu dimulakan dengan doa, zikir dan pengharapan, pasti Allah akan membuka jalan yang tidak disangka-sangka. Amalkan doa malam Isnin sebagai pengusir jin dan setan serta pembuka rezeki, dan lihatlah bagaimana hidup anda berubah dengan izin Allah ﷻ. Please Join Our Membership. Clik Here.

DOA PAGI AHAD DOA PEMBUKA REZEKI. 1. Doa Pagi Ahad, Permulaan Rehat dengan Redha Ilahi ,Ahad sering dikaitkan dengan hari rehat, namun dalam Islam, setiap pagi adalah peluang baru untuk memperbaharui niat dan menjemput rahmat Allah. Doa pagi Ahad bukan sekadar lafaz, tetapi bentuk ketundukan hati yang penuh harapan agar hari yang tenang ini disinari dengan rezeki yang luas dan diberkati. 2. Rezeki Tidak Datang Kerana Usaha Semata Ramai yang menyangka rezeki hanya datang dari usaha keras, namun Islam mengajar bahawa doa adalah kunci ghaib yang membuka pintu keberkatan. Pada pagi Ahad yang damai ini, melafazkan doa pembuka rezeki adalah langkah awal bagi membina keberkatan dalam seluruh minggu yang mendatang. 3. Doa sebagai Pelengkap Ikhtiar Allah berfirman dalam Surah Al-Baqarah ayat 186 bahawa Dia dekat dengan hamba-Nya yang berdoa. Maka, pagi Ahad adalah waktu yang sangat sesuai untuk meluahkan harapan dan keperluan dari rezeki zahir berupa harta, hingga rezeki batin berupa ketenangan dan kesihatan. 4. Waktu Pagi yang Diberkati Rasulullah ﷺ bersabda: Ya Allah, berkatilah umatku di waktu paginya. HR. Abu Dawud Ini menunjukkan betapa pentingnya memanfaatkan waktu pagi, terutama pada hari Ahad, untuk memohon keberkatan dan rezeki yang halal dan melimpah. 5. Doa Pembuka Rezeki yang Ringkas Tetapi Hebat Antara doa pagi yang sering diamalkan ialah: اللهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك وأغنني بفضلك عمن سواك Maksudnya: Ya Allah, cukupkanlah aku dengan yang halal daripada yang haram, dan kayakanlah aku dengan kurniaan-Mu daripada selain-Mu. Doa ini sangat sesuai dibaca setiap pagi, termasuk pagi Ahad, sebagai perisai dan pemikat rezeki halal. 6. Menjemput Malaikat untuk Mendoakan Sabda Nabi ﷺ: "Tidaklah seorang hamba berada di pagi hari melainkan dua malaikat turun. Salah satunya berkata: Ya Allah, berilah pengganti bagi yang berinfak." HR. Bukhari Muslim Maka pagi Ahad juga waktu terbaik untuk bersedekah dan memohon doa agar rezeki kita dilipat gandakan. 7. Doa sebagai Penawar Ketakutan Rezeki Dalam dunia yang penuh persaingan ini, ramai yang bimbang akan masa depan rezeki mereka. Namun doa pagi Ahad memberikan ketenangan bahawa rezeki itu hak Allah, dan Dia tidak akan menzalimi hamba-Nya yang berserah dan berusaha. 8. Ahad Bukan Hari Malas, Tapi Hari Meningkat Dalam budaya kerja, Ahad dianggap hari rehat. Namun dari sudut rohani, ia adalah peluang untuk menyusun semula niat dan azam. Mulakan dengan doa yang ikhlas, agar Isnin kelak dimulakan dengan hati yang sudah bersih dan penuh keberkatan. 9. Kesinambungan Doa dan Tawakkal Setiap pagi, termasuk pagi Ahad, adalah latihan untuk menyatukan ikhtiar dan tawakkal. Doa pembuka rezeki pada pagi Ahad menjadi jambatan antara apa yang kita rancang dan apa yang Allah takdirkan untuk kita. 10. Tutup Ahad dengan Syukur, Buka Isnin dengan Harapan Doa pagi Ahad tidak semestinya panjang. Yang penting adalah kesungguhan dan keikhlasan. Bacalah dengan penuh yakin bahawa Allah akan bukakan pintu rezeki dari arah yang tidak disangka. Jadikan pagi Ahad sebagai medan syukur dan pembuka jalan untuk rezeki yang melimpah sepanjang minggu.
